recipesJson.name: The Blueberry.
recipesJson.author: Borninfire138
recipesJson.description:
Ok. I know what you're thinking. 

That's a ridiculous amount of a single flavor but serious. It's necessary. 

Just try it. It's magical. 

Born.

reviews.text: Had this on my list for the longest time, was skeptical ðŸ¤¨ but dang, this gave me hope after trying a ton of crappy candy/juice profiles this one was like WOW okay! Tastes more like a blue-razz than any blue razz recipe Iâ€™ve tried, juicy and sweet itâ€™s got a lot of flavor for MTL people like me! Using a DVARW

As adevout fan of yours I had to go premium to rate this. Blueberries always let me down - not this time though. Blueberry Candy percentage is not for the faint-hearted but it works. I have never used Lemon Cicily this high either, but it works as well. Not sure which flavor brings a little bite on the throat but it's quite pleasant as well. I gave it a couple of days and it's very very good. Thank you, sir!
